K-Stuff creation in progress

May 10, 2011
Francois and I are currently creating "Kevoree ready" devices and connectors for already existing protocols.
In the pictures, you can see different steps in the creation of a DMX connector or a Kevoree-Inside power strip...
More to come :-)
